intro: Scorzonera africana, commonly known as African scorzonera, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. Its leaves are usually basal, hairy, and somewhat succulent, while its flowers are yellow with a central disk. Scorzonera africana is often cultivated for its ornamental value and has some traditional medicinal uses in local communities.
